archimate:Device.name: Money Counter (MC)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
Used for accurate, high-speed counting of banknotes in administrative and revenue-handling areas at St. Jude Hospital. Helps reduce manual errors, detect counterfeit currency, and speed up end-of-day cash reconciliation.
1. Counting Capabilities
• Counting Speed: o 800–1,500 notes per minute (adjustable speed settings) • Bill Size Compatibility: o Accepts multiple denominations and currency sizes o Bill size range: 100 × 50 mm to 180 × 90 mm • Hopper Capacity: o Minimum 200–300 notes • Stacker Capacity: o Minimum 200 notes
2. Currency Detection & Validation
• Counterfeit Detection: o Ultraviolet (UV) o Magnetic (MG) o Infrared (IR) o Size and thickness detection o : Image-based detection or CIS sensors
• Multi-Currency Support ():
o Capable of detecting and counting multiple local and foreign currencies
3. Operating Modes
• Modes Supported: o Count mode (simple tally) o Batch mode (preset quantity per bundle) o Add mode (accumulative counting) o Auto-start/stop feature
4. User Interface
• Display: o LED or LCD screen with real-time count, error messages, mode display o : Dual display (operator and customer side) • Controls: o Simple keypad or touch buttons o Programmable settings for different user preferences
5. Connectivity
• External Ports: o USB (for firmware updates) o RS-232 or LAN () for system integration or printer connection • Printer Compatibility (): o Supports thermal receipt printer for count reports
6. Power & Environmental Specs
• Power Supply: o 100–240V AC, 50/60 Hz (auto-switching power supply) o Power consumption: ≤80W operating, <5W standby • Operating Temperature: o 0°C to 40°C • Noise Level: o <70 dB during operation
7. Physical Dimensions
• Size: o Approx. 10–12 in (W) × 9–11 in (D) × 7–9 in (H) • Weight: o 10–15 lbs (portable desktop unit)
8. Safety & Maintenance
• Dust-Proof Enclosure: o Helps protect sensors and internal components • Self-Diagnostics: o Alerts for jammed bills, sensor errors, and maintenance needs • Cleaning Kit: o Includes soft brush or cleaning card support for sensors
Additional Features:
• Denomination Recognition: o Identifies specific bill values (advanced models) • Mixed Value Counting: o Calculates total value with different denominations mixed in the stack • Reject Pocket: o Separates suspicious or unreadable notes automatically
